tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE pesticide_and_herbicide_usage (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    drone_id INT,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(255),
    herbicide_name VARCHAR(255),
    usage_date DATE,
    usage_amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE pesticide_usage (
	pid INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name STRING,
	brand STRING,
	quantity FLOAT,
	application_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE herbicide_usage (
	hid INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name STRING,
	brand STRING,
	quantity FLOAT,
	application_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE Pesticides (ID INT PRIMARY KEY, Name STRING, Type STRING, Usage INT);
CREATE TABLE Herbicides (ID INT PRIMARY KEY, Name STRING, Type STRING, Usage INT);
CREATE TABLE Drones (ID INT PRIMARY KEY, Name STRING, Model STRING, Range INT);
CREATE TABLE Recommendations (ID INT PRIMARY KEY, DroneID INT, PesticideID INT, HerbicideID INT, RecommendationDate DATE);

CREATE TABLE pesticide_usage
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    pesticide_name VARCHAR(50),
    usage_date DATE,
    quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2),
    drone_recommendation_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE herbicide_usage
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    herbicide_name VARCHAR(50),
    usage_date DATE,
    quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2),
    drone_recommendation_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE drone_recommendations
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    recommendation_date DATE,
    field_id INT,
    pest_type VARCHAR(50),
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE fields
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(50),
    crop_type VARCHAR(50),
    field_size DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE pests
(
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_name VARCHAR(50),
    threat_level VARCHAR(20)
);
